name: Blood Domination
description:
The Will Of Blood Is Absolute.


In Blood Domination, the world of vampires is divided into two types: Doms who control, and subs who are controlled. Many have passed through the prestigious Éclair Gymnasium Academy, learning to tap into their full potential as Doms or subs in order to preserve the noble vampire bloodlines. This is a story of hunger and longing; quenched only by D/s acts in which subs offer themselves to the mercy of their Dom’s pleasure, for which the sub receives a reward in return.

Now, five different couples have arrived to pen the newest pages of the Academy’s chronicled history. Their objective is simple: to get through a temporary contract with their respective partner. Will they discover love and happiness, or will their D/s relationships break down under the weight of their own ambitions and tragedies? Your choices will decide their destiny.

The Setting and Characters


The Éclair Gymnasium Academy

An educational institution located among the mountains close to a city. For years, it has been a school that instructs students in the art of D/s acts. Here, you will encounter five different couples. Choose which of their stories you want to guide wisely.

Which Pair Will You Play First?




A delinquent and a naïve student become entangled in an unlikely, yet oddly compatible D/s relationship.



A spoiled aristocrat winds up with a devoted and mysterious lower-class vampire, whose motivations reveal powers beyond what the average vampire possesses.



Many years ago, an up-and-coming student’s life was changed forever after laying eyes on a certain school teacher.



Two childhood friends enter Éclair together… Will their friendship survive a shift into something more?



An outgoing player finds himself smitten with a shy, yet intelligent student. However, as their relationship deepens, a dark and troubled history that ties them together comes to light...

Features

  • Five different routes with branching storylines and multiple endings.
  • Immersive storylines filled with love, tragedy, comedy, and adventure.
  • Bonus scenarios with hours of content.
  • Approx. 25 hours of content for the first five routes and their respective bonus scenarios, with another 7 hours planned to be added for Season 2 content.
  • Enjoy gorgeous CG art sequences for extra flavor!
